CustomField.description: IF( RecordType.Name = 'Service', (Distance(Distributor_License__r.License_Location__c , Supplier_License__r.License_Location__c , 'mi')*1.3)+ (Distance(Supplier_License__r.License_Location__c , Receiver_License__r.License_Location__c , 'mi')*1.3),(Distance(Distributor_License__r.License_Location__c , Supplier_License__r.License_Location__c , 'mi')*1.3)+ (Distance(Distributor_License__r.License_Location__c , Supplier_License__r.License_Location__c , 'mi')*1.3))
CustomField.label: Route Miles
